scripts.examples:compile: cd repos/examples && wing compile -t tf-aws main.w
scripts.examples:plan: cd repos/examples/target/main.tfaws && terraform init && terraform plan
scripts.examples:deploy: cd repos/examples/target/main.tfaws && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve
scripts.website:compile: cd repos/website && wing compile -t tf-aws main.w
scripts.website:plan: cd repos/website/target/main.tfaws && terraform init && terraform plan
scripts.website:deploy: cd repos/website/target/main.tfaws && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve
